quoteText:
We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to help protect the security of your personal data.
however, please note that no system is ever completely secure.
title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify states they are committed to data security, the also state that they cannot guarantee any success in that area.
